short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speak It converts text to speech. Select and speak it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speak It converts text to speech. Just select the text and listen. Simple and comfortably.

How to
********
 * Select text which you want read.
 * Right click to the selected text.
 * Click to *Speak It!* in context menu.

No further reading!
